IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: HELPING PEOPLE WHO CARE MAKE LASTING CONTRIBUTIONS TO CAUSES THAT MATTER. COMMUNITY FOUNDATION OF HENDERSON COUNTY IS A HIGHLY VISIBLE, PHILANTHROPIC LEADER DIRECTED BY AN ENGAGED AND COMMITTED BOARD, STAFFED BY QUALIFIED EMPLOYEES, EMPOWERING DONORS AT ALL LEVELS TO INVEST IN PROFESSIONALLY MANAGED CHARITABLE FUNDS THAT ADDRESS COMMUNITY NEEDS.

IRS990.Description: AWARDED GRANTS TO 352 QUALIFIED ORGANIZATIONS ENGAGED IN LITERARY, EDUCATIONAL, HEALTH CARE, SCIENTIFIC, RELIGIOUS AND CHARITABLE ENDEAVORS PRIMARILY IN THE COMMUNITY CENTERED IN AND AROUND HENDERSON COUNTY, NORTH CAROLINA.

Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Identifier: PROCEDURES FOR MONITORING THE USE OF GRANT FUNDS INSIDE THE UNITED STATES
Form990ScheduleIPartIV.ReturnReference: SCHEDULE I, PAGE 1, PART I, LINE 2
Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Explanation: ALL SCHOLARSHIP RECIPIENTS MUST COMPLETE AND SIGN AN ACCEPTANCE FORM AGREEMENT. SCHOLARSHIPS ARE PAID AT THE BEGINNING OF EACH SEMESTER TO THE COLLEGE/UNIVERSITY ON BEHALF OF THE STUDENT. THE STUDENT MUST SUPPLY THE FOUNDATION WITH A COPY OF THEIR PREVIOUS SEMESTER GRADES AND VERIFICATION OF ENROLLMENT FOR THE CURRENT SEMESTER. THIS DOCUMENT IS REVIEWED TO ENSURE THAT THE STUDENT IS MAINTAINING THE APPROPRIATE GPA AND FIELD OF STUDY AS SPECIFIED BY THE SCHOLARSHIP GUIDELINES AND THAT THE EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTIONS ARE CREDITING SCHOLARSHIP FUNDS APPROPRIATELY.

GeneralExplanation.Explanation: HELPING PEOPLE WHO CARE MAKE LASTING CONTRIBUTIONS TO CAUSES THAT MATTER. COMMUNITY FOUNDATION OF HENDERSON COUNTY IS A HIGHLY VISIBLE, PHILANTHROPIC LEADER DIRECTED BY AN ENGAGED AND COMMITTED BOARD, STAFFED BY QUALIFIED EMPLOYEES, EMPOWERING DONORS AT ALL LEVELS TO INVEST IN PROFESSIONALLY MANAGED CHARITABLE FUNDS THAT ADDRESS COMMUNITY NEEDS.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: EXPLANATION ON VOLUNTEERS AND TYPES OF SERVICES OR BENEFITS
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: GOVERNANCE, COMMITTEE DELIBERATION & RECOMMENDATION, COMMUNITY ENGAGEMENT

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: ORGANIZATION'S PROCESS USED TO REVIEW FORM 990
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE 990 IS PRESENTED TO THE FULL BOARD PRIOR TO FILING BOTH IN HARD COPY AND OVERVIEW BY FINANCE OFFICER AND CEO IN A SCHEDULED BOARD MEETING.
FIRST MEETING EACH YEAR OF EACH COMMITTEE AND THE BOARD PLUS REQUESTS FOR SELF-DISCLOSURE WITH VOTES/ACTIONS.
THE PRIMARY SOURCE FOR COMPARABILITY DATA IS THE GRANTMAKERS SALARY AND BENEFITS REPORT BY COUNCIL ON FOUNDATIONS.
THE PRIMARY SOURCE FOR COMPARABILITY DATA IS THE GRANTMAKERS SALARY AND BENEFITS REPORT BY COUNCIL ON FOUNDATIONS.
THE FINANCIAL AUDIT IS PUBLISHED ON THE ORGANIZATION'S WEBSITE AND OTHE DOCUMENTS ARE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.
